answers.answer: 1. Body and brain consistently gets the oxygen needed to maintain health.2. No more waking up choking or short of breath with heart pounding.3. Better sustained sleep.4. Better quality of life during daytime.5. Increased alertness and sharper mind and memory.6. More energy for living life (and increased activity).7. Reduced risk of hypertension, diabetes, heart attack and stroke.8. For snorers, partner satisfaction.

question: What are the benefits that we can get for a cpap machine?This discussion is related to/posts/show/1343728.
title: Benefits of cpap
